entry.title: Finding Odata Service(s) for a Fiori aap
entry.content:
Hi

how find Odata service(s) if not mentioned in SAP Fiori Apps Reference Library, for example it doesnt show OData service(s) for app 'Display Material Cost Estimates'.

Thanks

Ashraf
S/4HANA Public Cloud

entry.title: Unable to restart jobs in Schedule Delivery Creation app (F2228)
entry.content:
Dear experts!

We would like to restart the jobs manually in Schedule Delivery Creation app (F2228) but for any existing jobs, the "Restart" button on the right is greyed out and disabled.

Is there a way to enable the button and start the job manually?

Best Regards,

Fujita

entry.title: How to cancel a change master (CCUNDO) in S4 Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi,

how can you cancel a future BOM change that was defined with a change master? It might be the case, that an error was made when defining the bom change or that especially for long lead times the BOM change might become irrelevant and has to be canceled. 

In ECC you could us the transaction CCUNDO.

Regards

Stefan

entry.title: Dunning notices will not print
entry.content:
We are currently implementing dunning, a test procedure has been set up in the system. 

Once an invoice was overdue by the relevant days, a dunning proposal for that customer was created. 

I then went into create dunning notes to run the dunning proposal ID (23110) 

As you can see from the screenshot it identifies there is 1 dunning notice to be sent but then fails to print and I do not recieve an email. Output parameter determination has been set up to email to myself, 

 

What am I doing wrong?

entry.title: Does SAP Public Cloud WM work with Zebra MC3401 with android 13/14?
entry.content:
Hi,

I want to upgrade my scanners to the MC3401 with android 13/14. SAP only has one reference device mc9300 with android 11. To me it seems weird that it should only work on devices with android 11. My question is can I upgrade to MC3401 with android 13/14 with no problems?
EDIT: After some more digging my conclusion is that public runs on SAPGUI5 and this supports the newer android versions:
https://help.sap.com/docs/ABAP_PLATFORM_NEW/468a97775123488ab3345a0c48cadd8f/74b59efa0eef48988d3b716bd0ecc933.html?version=202210.000&locale=en-US
Because scanners use webview the scanners fall in the category of phones&tablets. 
Conclusion is that the scanner with android 13/14 will work fine with public cloud. Correct me if im wrong

entry.title: How to take print output of delivery group in public cloud 2502 version ?
entry.content: Delivery group number is successfully created through "create delivery group" Fiori app in 2502 but when tried to take output of it getting error no output type is assigned. Will you please help with process steps or configuration for output type assignment to group delivery number s4hana public cloud 2502

entry.title: MPN AMPL in S/4HC
entry.content:
在S/4H OP中在物料主数据中维护对应的manufacturer part profile后，可以使用事务代码MP01维护approved manufacturer parts list(AMPL)

在S/4HC中，物料可以维护manufacturer part profile，但MP01事务代码已经不存在，是否有可以替代的APP来维护APML？

entry.title: VBA Error when send a soap request via VBA
entry.content:
Hi SAP expert,

We try to send a soap request via excel VBA to connect to SAP S/4HANA Public cloud system, but met some issue during development and test.

The first issue we are facing is -2146893016, the received certificate has expired when we send a soap request via VBA.

To solve this problem, we download the latest client certificate (. crt) and save it locally from Outbound Communication area on SAP Public Cloud.

(PS: we did not find the place where we can download the .p12 file, maybe cause the final issue below)

We uploaded the certificate into personal certificate:

 

Then add codes below to specify the certificate:

 

 

Unfortunately, we still have error below :

 

#-2147012852:请求证书完成客户验证

 

It seems lack the private key in the certificate( we guess ) .

We are now wondering - is it enough to download the certificate only in the communication scenario or what we can do to solve the problem?

Thanks!

entry.title: Replacemenet of V_WB2_VBRK_VBRP_1 CDS in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello all,

I need to extract the billing documents that are related to a specific condition contract document in Sales Settlement Management. In an on-premise and private cloud system, we could extract the data from V_WB2_VBRK_VBRP_1 CDS; however, in Public Cloud, I can not find how to retrieve data. I need these billing documents for printing out on the output. Please guide my how can we fetch the relevant data/replacement of V_WB2_VBRK_VBRP_1 CDS in Public Cloud.

Best regards,

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Supply Chain SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Settlement Management

entry.title: Integration between S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition and a bank using SFTP
entry.content:
Dear Community,

First of all, I’d like to thank you for taking the time to read this post.

I would like to ask if any of you have implemented an integration between S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition and a bank’s server. How did this development start initially?

From what I understand, it involves scope item 1EG, which includes a WSDL service (BANKSTATEMENTPOST_IN) with a predefined structure. After that, should this structure be transformed into a .txt file format to be sent to the bank via SFTP?

I’m attaching a basic and initial overview of how the process might look. I’d greatly appreciate it if you could share any reference materials or experiences you might have.

Best regards,
Jordano

Could you please tell us if this can be done in 2502 also? Please provide any documentation of mass role creation (template to create roles and assign the restrictions) and template to assign roles to users.

entry.title: Unable to Assign a Personal number to a Work Center in SAP
entry.content: I navigated to the Work Center screen and selected the "Capacity" tab, but I couldn"t find a way to add a Personal Number to the Work Center. Could you please guide me on the correct procedure to assign a Personal Number to a Work Center?

entry.title: Prevent internal movement tasks from being created when a source bin already has tasks again it
entry.content:
Hi SAP,


Our warehouse team has inquired about a potential improvement opportunity that may help with accuracy and reduce human operator errors. 


The team would like to prevent internal movement tasks from being created when a source bin already has tasks again it, such as picking or putaway tasks.  We would still like to be able to create multiple picking and putaway tasks to the same location (source bin) but we wouldn’t want to be able to add internal movement tasks to a bin that is already a source bin for the other two types.


We would like to understand what is and isn’t possible with this.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

is it because of assignment in Purchasing organization to co.code ....?

What will get impacted if we delete this assignment now what needs to be tested ...?

entry.title: Possibility for Mass Production Order Confirmation in Foreground from template in SAP Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement, where users perform "Mass Confirmation of production order's" through Excel template. Also, the confirmation screen - CO11N have certain validations (using Badi) in place for the order to be confirmed.

Each order is confirmed in foreground, allowing users to manipulate "Goods movement data - yield Qty, posting date, Storage location, Execution date, Component Qty" to be within validations placed. This is possible in ECC.

Requirement in Public cloud system:

1) User should be able to upload list of Production orders with other info through Template.

2) User should perform confirmation in the foreground with data picked from template and also allowing to change on screen confirmation data.

Has anyone achieved or any possible leads for the same to be replicated in SAP Public Cloud environment?

Thankyou.

entry.title: SAP S/4 HANA Cloud Public Edition - F0798 "Create Billing Documents" app - Billing Settings
entry.content:
Hi,

Do we have any role settings that would restrict the User to modify the SAP S/4 HANA Cloud Public Edition - F0798 "Create Billing Documents" app - Billing Settings.

Currently the Users can modify the Billing Settings.
